articles.author: Dan Gelernter
articles.title: Life Without the Vaccine › American Greatness - American Greatness
articles.description: When the vaccine first came out, I wasn’t too eager to get it. I’m young and healthy. Statistics indicated that I was unlikely to get COVID and extremely unlikely to get a serious case of it.

articles.title: General Electric to be broken up into 3 distinct companies - CBC.ca
articles.description: General Electric, the storied American manufacturer that struggled under its own weight after growing to become a sprawling conglomerate, will divide itself into three public companies focused on aviation, healthcare and energy.

articles.title: North American stock markets continue record runs after last week's economic gains - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The afterglow of last week's economic and employment gains propelled North American stock markets further along their record runs.
articles.content:
